summary: WHILE DRIVING THE VEHICLE STALLED.  THE CONSUMER RESTARTED THE VEHICLE BUT SOON AFTER THE VEHICLE STALLED AGAIN. AFTER DOING THIS FOR THE FOURTH TIME THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO THE DEALERSHIP.  IT WAS DETERMINED THAT THE PCM FAILED.  THE LEFT BRAKE LIGHT BULB BURNED OUT.  THE POWER DOOR LOCKS WERE INOPERATIVE.  *NLM      *CB   *NLM
